fields.description: The best way to learn something is by doing. In this post we'll learn how a duration-based tween animation works by writing one together.

frontmatter.title: How to fix: useEffect's final argument error

fields.description: You want to pass through a prop directly to useEffect's final argument, but React has other ideas.

frontmatter.title: How to break the rules of React Hooks

fields.description: 'Don't see limitations, only possibilities.' ~ Einstein. Or maybe Bruce Lee.
